Reckon is the ultimate copilot for your investments. With this powerful Chrome Extension + Telegram Bot, you'll have access to personalized insights related to your stocks, based on earnings releases, price action, technical indicators, risk metrics and more.

Our insights willl help you time your entry and exits, to diversify across sectors, to optimize your risk vs return, to bring discipline, and ultimately, to build the perfect portfolio!

Currently the extension works on Zerodha Kite. Once it reads your portfolio, the ReckonLiveBot on Telegram will keep you up to date.

The 'copilot' is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing trading platform, so you can track your holdings and stay informed without learning a new interface. 

And all this in a completely safe manner - we take data security and investor safety as a number 1 priority.
